thread.title: Berlusconi sells 48 percent stake of AC Milan for USD527.17m
thread.title_full: Berlusconi sells 48 percent stake of AC Milan for USD527.17m | MENAFN.COM

title: Berlusconi sells 48 percent stake of AC Milan for USD527.17m
text:
(MENAFN) ITALY'S former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi has signed a presale agreement to sell 48 percent of his AC Milan football club to a group led by Thai businessman Bee Taechaubol by the end of September.

"A deadline of 30 September has been set for transfer of the stake and payment of the USD527.17 million by 30 September," a spokesman for Berlusconi's holding company Fininvest spokesman told Reuters.

Fininvest also controls Italian broadcaster Mediaset and publisher Mondadori. The deal was signed by Fininvest and Taechaubol and approved by Berlusconi, the spokesman said.
